Articles.Content:
ア－リーアクセスがめちゃくちゃ楽しみです！

[Moderator added translation]

I'm really looking forward to early access!

Edited February 23, 2023 by James Kerman
Added Translation
Online function is too much to be expected

I'm looking forward to building colonies on distant planets then realising I've left critical life support at home, sending a rescue mission and then sending another rescue mission to rescue the rescue mission.
I'm excited for the modability of the game, and how the community will bring it into anything they want again!
I'm very exited to visit the new planets/solar systems
I'm excited for not having to mod in clouds, visuals, sounds, engine effects.
I'm currently just excited for the procedural wing, now I will finaly be capeble of making at least decent ssto's.

I’m excited, because KSP 2 has modular parts. I’m making plane replicas on Youtube, so it will be easier to make good shape of wings. I’m waiting for repainting parts too. I hope, that my pc can handle KSP 2.
I think what I'm most excited for would be off-world rocket building and the new destinations to explore
Most exited for the performance and really looking forward to coloring my planes!

I am excited to experience the new launch sequence at KSC. The countdown, water jets, etc. add so much to the authenticity of the experience. I am also looking forward to the realistic rocket engine sounds. The crackle as the engines roar through the atmosphere is one of my favourite things about rocket launches.
I'm excited for orbit-hub stations, and for an interesting science career. maybe 2-3 science resources , no linear, retraival artifacts from space....

I'm excited for colonies, not lot of people say this but imagine making a fully functioning ore mine to a launch point where a rover comes and picks up the ore then delivers it to the rocket so you can launch it to a space station

To be fair... everything?

From the better VAB and more consistent parts, to colonies and orbital construction, to interstellar voyages, new QOL additions... I mean, since it is an upgrade in almost everything, I'm unable to pick a favourite.

I guess... I'm just excited to see the game becoming a reality?
I am excited for the option to color parts
I'm excited because it's KSP. The only game that has kept me busy for over a decade. And with KSP 2, hopefully it will keep me busy for the next decade as well.
I'm excited for the many possibilities and the exploration.
Colonies! Finally I can do something after a successful landing now!

I am extremely excited for the ability to travel the stars, as this many solar systems (only other example being elite dangerous) adds a TON of variatability to the game, the scenery, and the environment (atmospheres, gravity, oceans, temperature)
Super excited towards rask and rusk and really looking forward for the new tutorials and interstellar travel
I'm very excited with colonies and launching rockets with the new awesome graphics
Everything
I'm very exited with number 2!
i am exicted for game
i want this game it looks cool
